text: Amphibian Man () is a 1962 Soviet science fiction movie directed by Vladimir Chebotaryov and Gennadi Kazansky.Пенопластовые акулы, реальный риск и отсылки к Голливуду: как снимался фильм «Человек-амфибия»Человек-амфибия It stars Vladimir Korenev, Anastasiya Vertinskaya, and Mikhail Kozakov. == Actors == * Vladimir Korenev as Ichthyander * Anastasiya Vertinskaya as Guttiere * Mikhail Kozakov as Pedro Zurita * Anatoli Smiranin as Old Baltazar == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1962 movies Category:1960s science fiction movies Category:Soviet science fiction movies Category:Movies directed by Vladimir Chebotaryov Category:Movies directed by Gennadi Kazansky
title: Amphibian Man (movie)
